title: Bully & Exit
description: --They’re ready to leave college behind. But their past won’t let them go.--Nathan Rhodes is a star hockey player for Western Michigan University, hiding in the closet and still desperately in love with his high school boyfriend. Caleb Stockwell is an openly bisexual theater student, hiding a broken heart behind a string of casual relationships. No one knew about their secret high school romance, but now, Nathan’s determined to make amends for the mistakes he made four years ago. Terrified of being hurt again, Caleb resists his apologies and refuses to admit he still has feelings for Nathan. With less than a month left before graduation, Nathan must make a grand gesture and risk everything to win Caleb back.
author: Brigham Vaughn
